name: black idea | فكره سوداء
description:
black idea is a multi-stage game

1- Story mode
2- Multiplayer mode

1- The story mode is a final stage that explains the story of the game through cinematic scenes and a different experience in the game. Great stages that make you enjoy the game in general. The story of the game tells the story of a man with a disease that causes him to enter into nightmares and dreams, and he cannot get out of these dreams that solve the mystery.

2- A multiplayer mode in which you can play with your friends in different games with distinct ideas, and most of the stages depend on solving puzzles to pass and move to the new stage
